app_title: Taste Mirror - Discover Your Cultural Twin

usa.insight: American culture is characterized by diversity and innovation. The Hollywood film industry, Broadway musicals, and various music genres contribute greatly to world culture.
usa.reason: Ideal for your creative and open-minded personality

south_korea.insight: South Korean culture is a perfect blend of technology and traditional values. K-Pop music, K-drama series, and traditional hanbok clothing combine modern and traditional values.
south_korea.reason: Suitable for your personality that loves technology and traditional values

uk.insight: British culture is the perfect balance of tradition and modernity. It has a rich cultural heritage with British rock music, Shakespeare theater, and tea culture.
uk.reason: Perfect for your personality that balances tradition and modernity

japan.insight: Japanese culture is a synthesis of traditional values and technological progress. It creates a unique culture with anime, manga, traditional tea ceremony, and modern technology.
japan.reason: Suitable for your personality that combines technology and art

user-001.bio: Tech enthusiast who loves sci-fi and electronic music. Always exploring new cultures and ideas.

user-002.bio: Creative director with a passion for complex narratives and artistic expression.

user-003.bio: Fashion influencer and social media creator. Passionate about representation and diversity.

user-004.bio: Digital artist and animation enthusiast. Finds beauty in the intersection of technology and nature.

user-005.bio: Environmental activist and book lover. Believes in the power of education and sustainable living.

user-006.bio: Software engineer and music enthusiast. Bridging cultures through technology and art.

user-007.bio: Content creator and comedy writer. Making people laugh while breaking stereotypes.

user-008.bio: Film enthusiast and cultural researcher. Exploring the magic in everyday life.
